alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Cecil; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:41AM EST until January 20 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of up to two inches, with locally higher amounts of up to 3 to 4 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northeast and northern Maryland and northern Virginia. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will initially start as rain, and then switch over to snow during the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Cecil; Frederick; Northern Baltimore; Northwest Harford; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery
